short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and organize your job applications efficiently with our intuitive extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkSkill - Your AI-Powered Job Application Assistant

Transform your job search with LinkSkill, the ultimate browser extension designed to simplify and enhance your job application process. Easily organize and track job opportunities across any website, from LinkedIn to your favorite job boards.

Key Features:

Seamless Job Bookmarking: Save job postings from any platform with a single click and organize them effortlessly within LinkSkill.
Customizable Job Boards: Manage your applications across tailored categories, including Bookmarks, Applied, Interviewing, Negotiation, Accepted, and Rejected, to keep track of your progress at every stage.
Enhanced Organization: Attach notes, upload documents, and link customized CVs and cover letters to specific applications, ensuring you're always ready for any opportunity.
Visual Progress Tracking: Gain clear insights into your job search journey, from application submission to final decision, keeping you on top of every opportunity.
Comprehensive Job Search Assistant: With features akin to popular task managers—such as tags, reminders, and priority settings—LinkSkill makes your job search more organized and efficient.

Let LinkSkill be your personal assistant as you navigate the complexities of job searching. Equip yourself with the tools you need to stay organized and maximize your chances of landing the right job.

Install LinkSkill Now and elevate your job application process! 

Visit us at https://www.linkskill.nl/
